name: Tested Steel
description:
This Was Supposed  To Be A Submission For The Gdevelop Jam #3 But Due To Losing Track Of Time It could Not Be Submitted but hey give it a try and tell me what u think you about it.

Gameplay:

Press The Left And Right Arrow key to activate laser wedges to block of the crates from hitting collect stars to unlock More Difficulties And Challenges.

Staff:

Programming: C.D.X

Music: Klol

Sound Effects: Silver Bullet 09
